data.text:
Sterling

Bakersfield, CA

The life you have imagined is here, and so is the home you have always wanted — one designed and built precisely as you wish. Each homesite inside the stately custom home neighborhood of Sterling is an opportunity for a one-of-a-kind showpiece, and yet all are united by classical themes in architecture, scale, landscape and ornamentation.

Address

3503 Botanical Drive

Bakersfield, CA 93311

Get Started

Register now to receive neighborhood updates or schedule an informational session. Or call 661-663-0600 to learn more.

Areas of Interest * Opt into text messaging By checking this box, you agree to receive recurring neighborhood information and promotional marketing text messages from WPG at the phone number provided. Msg frequency may vary. Msg & data rates may apply. View Terms and Privacy. Reply HELP for more info or STOP to cancel.

Floorplans

Find the perfect home design for you, then personalize the features and finishes from the ground up to make it truly yours.

Gallery

Whether you prefer pictures, videos, or virtual tours, one thing’s certain — you’re going to love what you see.

Explore

Find the perfect site for your new life. Click on any homesite to view details and live availability.

Community Amenities

Ready to play, make friends and enjoy life? Step outside your door and discover amazing community amenities, just waiting to be explored.

Features

From smart and eco-friendly to luxurious and uniquely personal, discover the thoughtful details that are included with your home.

Gracious Exteriors

Classically designed California Ranch, Spanish Colonial, and Italian Villa architectural detailing (per plan)

Long lasting, fire-resistant concrete tile roofs in a variety of styles and colors (per elevation)

Impressive handcrafted entry doors with handsome Baldwin® hardware

Fully finished 4-car garages with metal roll-up doors (per elevation)

Automatic garage door opener with two transmitters

Illuminated address number

Side and rear yard masonry walls

Convenient gas stub at rear of house for homeowner installed barbecue

Accessible garden hose faucets at front and rear of house

GFI-protected waterproof outlets at front and rear of house

Covered Outdoor Room

Capturing the essence of Southern California’s indoor / outdoor lifestyle, the Covered Outdoor Room features disappearing Western sliding pocket Nano doors and distinctively designed gas-burning fireplace with screen, gas logs and remote controller

Elegant Interior Appointments

8’ (select locations) and 6’8” Carrara interior doors with Schlage® hardware

Designer light fixtures complete with light bulbs

Custom-styled radius bullnose corners on interior walls

Spacious family rooms with oversized entertainment/media above fireplace

Impressive vaulted ceilings in various locations (per residence)

Graceful stairways with tread ends, skirt boards, risers, and wood capped handrails stained to match cabinets

Oversized 5-1/4” baseboards throughout the home

Hand finished smooth drywall surfaces

Formal dining rooms for elegant dining

Wood-burning fireplace with glass doors in family room (mantel and facing are per residence and elevation)

Pre-wired in selected areas for telephone and cable

Convenient interior laundry rooms with over-sized utility sink, quartz countertops and built-in cabinetry

KOHLER/Sterling® plumbing fixtures throughout

Gas supply for dryer

Electronic smoke detectors for fire safety

Interior fire sprinklers

A Gourmet Touch

Spacious family kitchen with large gourmet food preparation islands (all residences)

Large breakfast nooks

Ample kitchen pantries

Beautiful frameless cabinetry with choice of white Thermafoil or maple wood Euro-style in a selection of stains; with full-expansion dove-tail soft-close drawers, concealed soft-close hinges, laminated interiors, and adjustable shelves

Quartz countertops with full splash at cook top

KitchenAid® appliances in stainless steel including:

48” professional dual fuel slide-in range with 6 high BTU burners, griddle and electric double oven

27” built-in microwave (1000 watts) and 27” built-in third oven

4-cycle dishwasher

KOHLER cast iron sink with designer KOHLER ® faucet and easy pull-out spray

Refrigerated area plumbed for ice maker

Guest Bathrooms

Quartz countertops

Beautiful frameless cabinetry with choice of white Thermafoil or maple wood Euro-style in a selection of stains

3” x 6” ceramic tile surround in tub/shower in a selection of 2 colors

KOHLER® plumbing fixtures

Framed mirror in Powder Room with a selection of 3 frame colors

Luxurious Master Suite

Dramatic master suite featuring large walk-in closets with chrome rods, enameled shelves and mirrored doors

Lavish master bath with quartz countertops and 10” x 14” ceramic tile shower and bath surrounds

Raised counter height with dual sinks and widespread KOHLER® fixtures

Beautiful frameless cabinetry with choice of white Thermafoil or maple wood Euro-style in a selection of stains

Clear glass shower doors enclosures with chrome fixtures and hardware (per plan)

Extra-high shower head locations

Framed mirrors in a selection of 3 frame colors

Energy-Saving Highlights

Vinyl dual glazed windows for cooler homes in the summer, warmer in winter

Dual air conditioning and gas forced hot air heating

Automatic set-back thermostat

Fully insulated exterior walls and ceilings

Weather stripping on all exterior doors

Fireplaces with energy saving glass doors in family room

Water saving features on toilets and shower heads

Dual energy-efficient tankless water heater system

Personalizing Options

Woodbridge Pacific Group invites you to tailor your new home in an exciting variety of ways. Please see your sales representative to discover the many opportunities available to personalize your home.

In the interest of continuing product improvement, Woodbridge Pacific Group reserves the right to change prices, plans, specification or features without prior notice or obligation

Schools

Close proximity to great schools means your students enjoy the advantage of an excellent education, and opportunities to develop and grow.

10-Year Limited Warranty

Your home is a large and complex product, so we established an incredibly comprehensive Customer Service Program that covers major structures, electrical, plumbing, hardscape, and much more.

Learn More

Product Warranties

Home Care Tips

Personalized Maintenance

Preferred Builder

Sterling features 36 home sites ranging in size from 14,000 to 32,000 square feet. Those who purchase a Sterling home site will then select a builder from WPG’s approved roster of experienced local companies. Custom home shoppers can learn more by visiting the Mahogany and Patina sales galleries.

Visit Us

Want to find your forever home? Call to schedule a tour of our homes and community, or stop by for a visit. We’d love to show you around.

Address

3503 Botanical Drive

Bakersfield, CA 93311

Get Directions
